name: Arlo's Valentines
description:
Make cute notes for your friends or loved ones!

NOTE: your saved cards will be saved to:

C:\Users\user\AppData\Roaming\arlo_valentine\

An easy way to get there is to open your file explorer and type the following the in filepath field: "%appdata%", then press

Find the source code here: https://github.com/david-fletcher/arlo-valentines
